hero.headline: Project Support Logistics & Transportation
hero.subhead: End-to-end support including equipment rentals, oil & gas services, shipping, and customs clearance for major projects across Bangladesh.

home.aboutSnippet: SHAMOLIMA has specialized in this sector through our extensive experience of providing Professional Consultancy Services, Supplying Project Materials, Providing Construction and Erection facilities, Supplying Oil and Gas field related equipment, Power Plant Heavy Engine, Transformer & other heavy material transportation from Mother Vessel to project site after Shipping & Customs clearance under our own license.

focusAreas.title: Equipment Rentals
focusAreas.copy: Certified Cranes, Trailers, Forklifts, and a wide range of heavy equipment to support any project requirement.

focusAreas.title: Oil, Gas & Power
focusAreas.copy: Extensive knowledge and experience in moving Rigs, drilling equipment, and supporting the energy sector.

focusAreas.title: Shipping & Customs
focusAreas.copy: Actively engaged in Shipping, Freight Forwarding, and Customs Clearance for infrastructure and development projects.

focusAreas.title: Complete Site Services
focusAreas.copy: Includes warehousing, crew handling, and certified manpower to ensure seamless on-site operations.

highlights.title: Professional & Safe Support
highlights.detail: We provide support with certified equipment and trained manpower, ensuring you can relax while we manage your project.

highlights.title: Commitment to Quality
highlights.detail: Firmly committed to achieving client satisfaction by fulfilling various needs through excellence, innovation, and continual improvement.

highlights.title: Focus on QHSE
highlights.detail: We are committed to preventing injury and ill health by providing a healthy working environment and minimizing all risks.

highlights.title: Regulatory Compliance
highlights.detail: We are determined to comply with all applicable regulatory and legal requirements related to our products and services.

phases.title: Planning & Engineering
phases.copy: We begin every project with a deep dive into the scope, conducting feasibility studies and creating robust operational plans.

phases.title: Mobilisation & Execution
phases.copy: Our field teams, led by experienced supervisors, execute the plan with precision, adhering to the highest safety standards.

phases.title: Project Management
phases.copy: A dedicated project manager serves as your single point of contact, ensuring seamless communication and coordination.

phases.title: Completion & Handover
phases.copy: We conclude with a comprehensive handover, providing full documentation and ensuring all project objectives have been met.

about.pageIntro: Since 1984, Shamolima Limited has been a pioneering force in integrated project logistics and support across Bangladesh. With decades of unparalleled experience, we specialize in delivering complex solutions for energy, infrastructure, and industrial sectors.
about.missionStatement: Our mission is to provide safe, efficient, and reliable project support services that exceed client expectations, leveraging our specialized fleet, expert team, and deep local knowledge.
